summary: Backend API testing completed successfully for MegaRadio Now Playing API. All 11 tests passed. Verified ICY metadata extraction, fallback behavior, and response structure.
critical_code_review_comments: DEPRECATION WARNING in frontend logs: expo-av is deprecated and will be removed in SDK 54 - consider migrating to expo-audio/expo-video
DEPRECATION WARNING: shadow* style props deprecated, use boxShadow instead
DEPRECATION WARNING: textShadow* style props deprecated, use textShadow string format
LAYOUT WARNING: No route named 'station/[id]' exists in nested children - verify route exists or remove from _layout.tsx
DEPRECATION WARNING: props.pointerEvents deprecated, use style.pointerEvents
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend Now Playing API fully tested with 11 passing tests. Tests cover: root endpoint, now-playing endpoint with ICY metadata, fallback behavior, response structure validation, invalid station handling, and status endpoints. Sample station IDs used: 68a8c47dbd66579311ab228c, 68a8c46abd66579311aaf265, 68a8c496bd66579311ab6165. Frontend was not tested per request - focus was backend only.
